targets.query: alias({project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', name='can_write', node='by_host'}, '{{host}}')
alias({project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', name='can_read', node='by_host'}, '{{host}}')
top(5, "last", alias(sum({host='by_node', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', node='primary', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_opcounters.*_rate', shard='*'}) by name, "{{name}}"))

top(5, "last", alias(sum({host='by_node', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', node='secondary', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_opcounters.*_rate', shard='*'}) by name, "{{name}}"))

top(5, "last", alias(sum({host='by_node', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', node='secondary', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_opcountersRepl.*_rate', shard='*'}) by name, "{{name}}"))

drop_empty_lines(top(5, "last", flatten(to_vector(alias(({name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.commands.latency_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='primary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'} / 1000) / {name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.commands.ops_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='primary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}, "commands")), to_vector(alias(({name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.reads.latency_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='primary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'} / 1000) / {name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.reads.ops_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='primary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}, "reads")), to_vector(alias(({name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.writes.latency_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='primary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'} / 1000) / {name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.writes.ops_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='primary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}, "writes")), to_vector(alias(sum({name='server_status_admin_metrics.getLastError.wtime.totalMillis_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='primary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}) by name / {name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.writes.ops_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='primary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}, "writes_concern_wait")), to_vector(alias(({name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.transactions.latency_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='primary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'} / 1000) / {name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.transactions.ops_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='primary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}, "transactions")))))

drop_empty_lines(top(5, "last", flatten(to_vector(alias(({name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.commands.latency_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='secondary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'} / 1000) / {name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.commands.ops_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='secondary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}, "commands")), to_vector(alias(({name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.reads.latency_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='secondary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'} / 1000) / {name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.reads.ops_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='secondary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}, "reads")), to_vector(alias(({name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.writes.latency_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='secondary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'} / 1000) / {name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.writes.ops_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='secondary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}, "writes")), to_vector(alias(sum({name='server_status_admin_metrics.getLastError.wtime.totalMillis_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='secondary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}) by name / {name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.writes.ops_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='secondary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}, "writes_concern_wait")), to_vector(alias(({name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.transactions.latency_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='secondary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'} / 1000) / {name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.transactions.ops_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='secondary', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', host='by_node', shard='*'}, "transactions")))))

top(5, "last", alias((sum({name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.*.latency_rate', node='by_host', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', shard='*'}) by host / 1000) / sum({name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.*.ops_rate', node='by_host', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', shard='*'}) by host, "{{host}}"))
top(5, "last", alias(sum({host='by_node', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', node='*', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.*.ops_rate', shard='*'}) by name, "{{name}}"))

top(5, "last", alias(sum({host='by_node', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', node='*', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_opLatencies.*.latency_rate', shard='*'}) by name / 1000, "{{name}}"))

bottom(8, "last", flatten(to_vector(alias(series_max({name='server_status_admin_connections.current', node='by_host', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', shard='*'} + {name='server_status_admin_connections.available', node='by_host', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', shard='*'}), "limit")), to_vector(alias({name='server_status_admin_connections.current', node='by_host', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', shard='*'}, "current_{{host}}"))))

top(5, "last", alias(sum({host='by_node', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', node='primary', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_metrics.document.*_rate', shard='*'}) by name, "{{name}}"))

top(5, "last", alias(sum({host='by_node', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', node='secondary', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_metrics.document.*_rate', shard='*'}) by name, "{{name}}"))
alias(sum({node='by_host', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_metrics.document.*_rate', shard='*'}) by host, "{{host}}")

top(5, "last", flatten(to_vector(alias({name='server_status_admin_metrics.queryExecutor.scanned_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='total', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', shard='*'} / {name='server_status_admin_metrics.document.returned_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='total', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', shard='*'}

, "scanned_keys / returned_docs")), to_vector(alias({name='server_status_admin_metrics.queryExecutor.scannedObjects_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='total', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', shard='*'} / {name='server_status_admin_metrics.document.returned_rate', project='internal-mdb', node='total', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', shard='*'} , "scanned_docs / returned_docs"))))

top(5, "last", alias(sum({host='by_node', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', node='*', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_metrics.cursor.open.pinned|server_status_admin_metrics.cursor.open.noTimeout|server_status_admin_metrics.cursor.open.total', shard='*'}) by name, "{{name}}"))
top(5, "last", alias(sum({host='by_node', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', node='*', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_metrics.ttl.*_rate', shard='*'}) by name, "{{name}}"))

top(5, "last", alias(sum({host='by_node', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', node='*', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_asserts.user_rate|server_status_admin_asserts.msg_rate|server_status_admin_asserts.regular_rate', shard='*'}) by name, "{{name}}"))

alias({project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', name='server_status_admin_metrics.operation.scanAndOrder_rate', node='by_host'}, '{{host}}')

bottom(5, "last", to_vector(to_vector(alias({name='server_status_admin_globalLock.currentQueue.readers', node='by_host', project='internal-mdb', cluster='mdb_{{cid}}', service='mdb', shard='*'}, "{{host}}_readers"))))
